# Position

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class       | Support        |
| ----------- | -------------- |
| `absolute`  | âœ… Full Support |
| `relative`  | âœ… Full Support |
| `fixed`     | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `sticky`    | ğŸŒ Web only    |
